awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: A group of flamenco dancers are rehearsing a very spanish version of the Prosper Merimee's drama. Antonio (the coreographer) falls in love with Carmen (the main dancer). Their story then turns similar to the play.

title: Carmen
